channel.title: Mods please read and try to help me since no one else can
channel.description: I have a server, it has been working fine all day yesterday and today. But now when I make myself admin it disables my account. What is the problem? How do I fix it? How do I unbann? Please help...

item.title: Mods please read and try to help me since no one else can
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Omg, am I going to have to make a new server??? I spent loads of time on this, why the hell is it doing this? It happened when I was killing Jad then I disconnected and it banned me. And banns all accounts I make admins.(I can make my friends admin and they are fine) I don’t get this? Could a Moderator or someone please help me? I’m very upset.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 06:27:20 PM[/size][hr]Please help!!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 06:37:46 PM[/size][hr]Someone PLEASE help me!!!

Read full topic

item.description:

Nah… Go to Data, and then go to “bannedusers” and you see the name, and then delete and save.

Same for banned ips.
